member.name: D2D_RECT_F
member.summary: Represents a rectangle defined by the coordinates of the upper-left corner (left, top) and the coordinates of the lower-right corner (right, bottom).

member.name: D2D_RECT_F.left
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_F.top
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the upper-left corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_F.right
member.summary: The x-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.

member.name: D2D_RECT_F.bottom
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the lower-right corner of the rectangle.
